items.name: Mind Sliver
explicitMods: 4% chance to receive additional Essences when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
7% chance to receive additional Weapons when opening a Reward Chest in a Heist
18% chance in Heists for Orbs of Alteration to drop as Orbs of Alchemy instead
3% chance in Heists for Regal Orbs to drop as Divine Orbs instead
items.descrText: You must find the sculpture The Catch in a Smuggler's Den or Underbelly Blueprint to be able to equip this
